MEGARA DRP documentation¶

Welcome. This is the Documentation for MEGARA DRP (version 0.6).

MEGARA (Multi-Espectrógrafo en GTC de Alta Resolución para Astronomía) is an optical Integral-Field Unit (IFU) and Multi-Object Spectrograph (MOS) designed for the GTC 10.4m telescope in La Palma.

MEGARA DRP is the official Data Reduction Pipeline for MEGARA. It can be run as a standalone module (via a command line interface) or integrated in the GTC Control System.
